mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_id, p.pro_name, p.ser_conts, p.bsn_id, img.pfname, t.pro_type, t.pro_type_id FROM product p LEFT JOIN pro_img img ON p.pro_id = img.pro_id LEFT JOIN pro_type_id t ON p.pro_type_id = t.pro_type_id WHERE p.pro_id = #{pro_id}

SELECT u.user_id, u.n_name, r.reservation_id, r.room_id, ro.room_name, ro.pro_id, p.bsn_id, b.bsn_name, re.review_id, re.star, re.review_det, re.rev_time, ri.fname, rc.rv_com_det, rc.rv_com_time FROM ij_user u JOIN reservation r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN room ro ON r.room_id = ro.room_id JOIN product p ON ro.pro_id = p.pro_id JOIN bsn_user b ON p.bsn_id = b.bsn_id JOIN review re ON r.reservation_id = re.reservation_id LEFT JOIN review_img ri ON re.review_id = ri.review_id JOIN review_comm rc ON re.review_id = rc.review_id WHERE p.pro_id= #{pro_id}

SELECT re.recom_id, re.title, re.detail, re.recom_loc, re.recom_time, re.reservation_id, bi.fname, rs.room_id, ro.pro_id, u.user_id, u.n_name FROM recomm re LEFT JOIN board_img bi ON re.recom_id = bi.recom_id LEFT JOIN reservation rs ON re.reservation_id = rs.reservation_id LEFT JOIN room ro ON rs.room_id = ro.room_id LEFT JOIN product p ON ro.pro_id = p.pro_id LEFT JOIN ij_user u ON rs.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.pro_id= #{pro_id}

SELECT pt.pro_type, pt.pro_type_id, p.pro_id, p.pro_name, p.pro_loc, p.basic_info, p.res_ann, p.ser_conts, r.room_id, r.room_name, r.room_price, r.checkin, r.checkout, r.min_cnt, r.max_cnt, r.smoking, r.bed_cnt, res.room_id, res.user_id, res.user_cnt, res.start_dt, res.end_dt, res.payment, res.status, ri.rfname AS room_img_fname FROM pro_type_id pt JOIN product p ON pt.pro_type_id = p.pro_type_id JOIN room r ON p.pro_id = r.pro_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_id, user_id, user_cnt, start_dt, end_dt, payment, status FROM reservation WHERE reservation_id IN ( SELECT MIN(reservation_id) FROM reservation GROUP BY room_id ) ) res ON r.room_id = res.room_id LEFT JOIN room_img ri ON r.room_id = ri.room_id WHERE r.room_id = #{room_id} AND (res.start_dt IS NULL OR 1=1) AND (res.end_dt IS NULL OR 1=1) AND (p.pro_id IS NULL OR 1=1) AND (res.user_cnt IS NULL OR 1=1)

SELECT DISTINCT rec.recom_id, rec.title, rec.detail, rec.RECOM_TIME, res.USER_ID FROM recomm rec, reservation res, room r, product prod, RECOMM_COMM rc WHERE rec.RESERVATION_ID = res.RESERVATION_ID AND res.ROOM_ID = r.ROOM_ID AND r.PRO_ID = prod.PRO_ID AND rec.RECOM_ID = rc.RECOM_ID AND r.pro_id=#{pro_id}

SELECT rc.RC_COM_ID, rc.USER_ID, rc.RC_COM_DET, rc.RC_COM_TIME FROM recomm rec, reservation res, room r, product prod, RECOMM_COMM rc WHERE rec.RESERVATION_ID = res.RESERVATION_ID AND res.ROOM_ID = r.ROOM_ID AND r.PRO_ID = prod.PRO_ID AND rec.RECOM_ID = rc.RECOM_ID AND rec.RECOM_ID = #{recom_id}
SELECT bi.fname FROM recomm rec, BOARD_IMG bi WHERE rec.RECOM_ID = bi.RECOM_ID AND bi.RECOM_ID = #{recom_id}
